title: Hellooo World!!
author: Ajit (MJPEG Optimisation)
content:
I am elated to work for TimVideos.us this summer as part of the Google Summer of Code programme. I will be working on optimisation of MJPEG core of HDMI2USB device. Currently the MJPEG core works at 15 fps and I have to improve it to 120 fps which is a challenging task.

I will be writing more about the project and the work I am planning to do in my later blog. Right now I am just happy to set the ball rolling.
Originally posted on TimVideo GSoC 2014: MJPEG Optimisation
